description: Application to remove or vary condition 2 - revised drawings to replace approved drawings indicating the following: (i) Reconfiguration of internal layout from x 3 one bedroom flats and  x 6 two bedroom flats to x 3 one bedroom flats, x 4 two bedroom flats and x 2 (two bedroom) duplex flats, including reconfiguration of stair cores, stairwells and lifts. (i) Removal of an escape stair from roof (ii) Reduction in size of the central core mass, including stairwell (iii) Removal of plant room, stairwell overrun and balustrade (iv) Reworking of steps over flat roof to emergency stairwell (v) Roof to be slate rather than zinc, and variation of condition 3, the flats in the mansard roof extension only to comply with Code Level 3 for sustainable homes relating to Planning Permission allowed on appeal ref APP/V5570/A/11/2149907 dated 25 August 2011.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION; The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
